author: Alex Gallegos
comment: I was very disappointed when I installed this face for use on my Moto 360. The bottom where 6 o'clock is is covered.

reply.author: FruitieX
reply.content: Hello, thanks for your feedback. I'll see what I can do to fix the issue on Moto 360. Would you be interested in beta testing, since I don't have a Moto 360 myself? Contact me via e-mail if you're interested!

title: Shrink Ring just a bit
